UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile within the Gowri Sankar Chit Funds application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the user's avatar image.

kycId.description: Reference to KYC details. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:1 KYC)

languagePreference.description: The user's preferred language (e.g., 'en' for English, 'te' for Telugu').

ChitGroup.title: ChitGroup
ChitGroup.description: Represents a Chit group within the Gowri Sankar Chit Funds application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the chit group.

durationMonths.description: Duration of the chit in months.

adminId.description: Reference to the UserProfile who is the admin. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N ChitGroup)

memberIds.description: References to UserProfiles who are members of this chit group. (Relationship: UserProfile N:N ChitGroup)

Payment.title: Payment
Payment.description: Represents a payment made by a user for a chit group.

userId.description: Reference to the UserProfile who made the payment. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N Payment)

chitGroupId.description: Reference to the ChitGroup for which the payment was made. (Relationship: ChitGroup 1:N Payment)

paymentDate.description: Date and time when the payment was made.

paymentMethod.description: Method used for the payment (e.g., UPI, Net Banking, Debit/Credit Card).

KYC.title: KYC
KYC.description: Represents Know Your Customer (KYC) details for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the KYC details.

BankDetails.title: BankDetails
BankDetails.description: Represents bank details for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the bank details.

accountNumber.description: Bank account number of the user.

ifscCode.description: IFSC code of the user's bank.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to support the Gowri Sankar Chit Funds application, focusing on user authentication, chit management, payments, and KYC/Bank details. Authorization Independence is achieved through path-based ownership for user-related data and denormalization where needed. For example, `chitGroups` includes the `adminId` to ensure that access control can be enforced without needing to `get()` the user's profile.  Collections are segregated based on their security posture (e.g., user profiles are separated from chit groups).  The structure also facilitates secure `list` operations by ensuring that collections contain documents with homogeneous security requirements. Roles are managed implicitly through document ownership (e.g., a user is an admin of a chit group if they created it, as denoted by the adminId). User profile, KYC, and bank details are stored under the `/users/{userId}` path, providing clear ownership. Chit groups are stored in a separate collection, with each chit group document containing the `adminId` to denote the group administrator. Payment information is stored in a `payments` subcollection under each user, linking payment activity to the user who made the payment.
